title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Expedia

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: $780 off travel packages to Japan, 70% off sunglasses at Catch, cheap PS4 Coolers and more!

1. Ratehacker deals: Looking for a new credit card, home loan or savings account? Here are the best deals and lowest rates for October. Click here!

2. 70% off sunglasses: Spring is in full bloom which means the sun is glaring. Protect your eyes and look cool into the bargain by picking up a cheap pair of sunnies from Catch. There are 200 styles to choose from leading brands with prices starting at under $10. Click here!

3. 25% off Razer laptops: Amazon Australia has knocked up to 25% off a range of Razer Blade gaming laptops. This works out to a saving of over $600 on some models. Click here!

4. Cheap PS4 Coolers: Keep your PlayStation 4 in tip-top shape with a BlueFire PS4 Vertical Stand + Cooling Fan. The unit also includes two controller charging ports and storage slots for your games. Click here!

5. $780 off Japan travel: Exodus is offering up to $780 off Ancient & Modern Japan packages with 14-day tours starting at $7799. To get the deal, you need to book before 18 October with all trips departing between 18/10/19 and 31/12/20. Click here!

6. Cheap 90Mbps NBN: NBN 100 plans tend to max out at around 80MBps during peak usage times. Superloop just upped the ante with a guaranteed evening speed of 90Mbps. Here are the details:

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: $780 off travel packages to Japan, 70% off sunglasses at Catch, cheap PS4 Coolers and more!...
